attributes.action: Allow the Government to explain clearly on their decisions.
attributes.additional_details:
Sign this petetion to get the Government to enlighten all those ignorant of the true impact of 'Maggie' Thatcher. Highlighting that the labour governmeent after her closed down more pits then she did, also highlighting that consecutive unsuccessful labour governments allowed the rise of Trade Unions & hyper inflation.

My wish is when a government makes a decision which impacts the country, they explain in simple forms the impact and the effects on the people of britian, enlightening those who are otherwise ignorant of the knowledge.
The matter of 'Maggie' Thatcher is an example.
